import React, {useRef} from "react"; import "./search-bar.css"; import { Col, Form, FormGroup } from "reactstrap"; const SearchBar = () =>{ const locationRef = useRef("") const distanceRef = useRef(0) const maxGroupSizeRef = useRef(0 ) const searchHandler = () =>{ const loaction = locationRef.current.value const distance = distanceRef.current.value const maxGroupSizeRef = maxGroupSizeRef.current.value } return (

) }; export default SearchBar;
